entry.title: Kaijuan Yuan
entry.content:
Research Intersets

  • Information visualization
  • Visual analytics
  • Uncertainty modeling
  • Mutli-source information fusion

Education

  • M.S. Computer Science and Technology
    Zhejiang University, Aug. 2017 - Present

  • B.S. Computer Science and Technology
    Southwest University, Sep. 2013 - Jul. 2017

Experience

  • Research Assistant
    Dec. 2016 - Aug. 2017
    The State Key Laboratory of CAD&CG, Zhejiang University, Hangzhou, China
    Supervisor: Prof. Yingcai Wu

  • Undergraduate Research Assistant
    May. 2014 - Jul. 2017
    The Laboratory of Information Fusion and Intelligent Science, Southwest University, Chongqing, China
    Supervisor: Prof. Yong Deng

Publications

  • Yuan, K., Xiao, F., Fei, L., Kang, B., & Deng, Y. (2016). Modeling sensor reliability in fault diagnosis based on evidence theory. Sensors, 16(1), 113.

  • Yuan, K., Xiao, F., Fei, L., Kang, B., & Deng, Y. (2016). Conflict management based on belief function entropy in sensor fusion. SpringerPlus, 5(1), 638.

  • Yuan, K., & Deng, Y. (2017). Conflict evidence management in fault diagnosis. International Journal of Machine Learning and Cybernetics, 1-10.

Awards & Honors

  • Outstanding Graduates Awards · 2017
  • Outstanding Graduate Thesis Award · 2017
  • Merit Student · 2014 · 2015 · 2016
  • Spiritual Advanced Individual · 2017
